name: Crossbow Mastery
source: Curse of the Crimson Throne Player's Guide pg. 10
text: You can load crossbows with blinding speed and even fire them in melee with little fear of reprisal.
prerequisites: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot.
benefit: The time required for you to reload any type of crossbow is reduced to a free action, regardless of the type of crossbow used. You can fire a crossbow as many times in a full attack action as you could attack if you were using a bow. Reloading a crossbow for the type of crossbow you chose when you took Rapid Reload no longer provokes attacks of opportunity.
special: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Crossbow Mastery as a combat style feat.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, reloading any kind of crossbow no longer provokes attacks of opportunity.
text_zh: 你能够以令人目眩的速度装填弩弓，甚至可以在近战中用他们射击而不必担心遭到报复。
prerequisites_zh: 敏捷15，近距射击，快速装填，快速射击。
benefit_zh: 不论你使用的弩的类型为何种，装填弩所需要的时间降低为自由动作。你能够在全力攻击中使用弩射击多次，就如同使用弓的时候一般。当你选取“快速装填”专长时所选择的那种类型的弩在进行装填时不会引起借机攻击。
special_zh: 从6级起，选择【箭术战斗流派】的游侠能够将“十字弓熟稔”作为战斗流派专长进行选取。
staminaText_zh: 只要耐力池中还又至少一点耐力，装填任何类型的弩弓都不会引起借机攻击。
